item.title: [B][COLOR yellow]Welcome to True Crimes Series Section[/COLOR][/B]

dir.name: [B][I][COLOR white]24 Hours in Police Custody[/COLOR][/I][/B]
dir.summary: Cameras follow Bedfordshire Police over a 24 hour period as they respond to emergencies, investigate crimes, arrest suspects and battle against the clock.

dir.name: [B][I][COLOR white]A Body in the Basement[/COLOR][/I][/B]
dir.summary: These bone-chilling true-crime stories of murder explore crimes in which the victims' dead bodies are found in the basement of a home. The location might be their own home, or the killer's home, or an abandoned building.

dir.name: [B][I][COLOR white]Accused: Guilty or Innocent?[/COLOR][/I][/B]
dir.summary: An intimate account of what happens when someone is formally charged with a crime and sent to trial as told by the perspective of the accused, their legal team and their family members.

dir.name: [B][I][COLOR white]A Killer's Mistake[/COLOR][/I][/B]
dir.summary: Crime series looking at the key errors made by murderers that led to their arrest.

dir.name: [B][I][COLOR white]A Lie to Die For[/COLOR][/I][/B]
dir.summary: Lies told by some people will be protected at any cost, including murder. Each stand alone episode takes you on the journey of each case as investigators unravel each complex case of these horrendous tragedies, all to protect the lie. The premiere "A Marriage Bed Of Lies," looks at the life to two high school sweethearts. Mark and Lori's life seemed perfect, reaching and celebrating many milestones, including 5 year wedding anniversary, Lori's pregnancy and Mark is accepted to med school interstate. Alas as they we're about to make the life changes and move interstate their dreams quickly turned to nightmares.

dir.name: [B][I][COLOR white]Almost Unsolved[/COLOR][/I][/B]
dir.summary: A true crime series that explores murder cases where investigations stalled or went cold; often for decades. Featuring interviews with the experts and law enforcement officials who worked these cases along with dramatic re-enactments we follow detectives, scientists and even amateur sleuths that dedicate their lives to bringing justice and closure to the cases that nearly went unsolved... Almost.

dir.name: [B][I][COLOR white]A Time to Kill[/COLOR][/I][/B]
dir.summary: Determined investigators must piece together a crime scene to reconstruct the timeline, unlock the motive and ultimately get closer to the killer.

dir.name: [B][I][COLOR white]At Witt's End the Hunt for A Killer[/COLOR][/I][/B]
dir.summary: 30 years after the homicide of 19-year-old Melissa Witt, a group of detectives from neighboring agencies band together in an attempt to re-examine the case file for new leads that may bring a resolution to her case and justice to her friends and family. Follow along with investigators as they chase potential suspects and work to finally zero in on the person responsible for her murder.

dir.name: [B][I][COLOR white]A Wedding and a Murder[/COLOR][/I][/B]
dir.summary: Examine the true stories of engagements, weddings, and picture-perfect honeymoons that went from joyous celebration to untimely death. Each episode exposes a grisly homicide set against the backdrop of what appears to be wedded bliss.

dir.name: [B][I][COLOR white]An Unexpected Killer[/COLOR][/I][/B]
dir.summary: TV series that takes a closer look into homicide investigations through interviews with potential suspects, re-enactments and in-depth examinations of the crime scene.

dir.name: [B][I][COLOR white]Becoming Evil: Serial Killers[/COLOR][/I][/B]
dir.summary: This 7-part season is filled with expert interviews and in-depth portraits of some of America's most infamous killers including John Wayne Gacy, David Berkowitz, Richard Ramirez, James DeAngelo, Aileen Wuornos, Jeffrey Dahmer, Andrew Cunanan, Ted Bundy and many others.

dir.name: [B][I][COLOR white]Black Coast Vanishings[/COLOR][/I][/B]
dir.summary: An investigation into the disappearance of six people in the small town of Piha Beach, which divides the locals and gives rise to fear and suspicion.

dir.name: [B][I][COLOR white]Bubble & Squeak Murder: The Killing of David Jackson[/COLOR][/I][/B]
dir.summary: Two-part true documentary examining the events that led to the murder of 78-year-old former army officer David Jackson by his 66-year-old wife Penny in Somerset on the eve of Valentine's Day 2021.

dir.name: [B][I][COLOR white]Can I Tell You A Secret?[/COLOR][/I][/B]
dir.summary: Three women's lives are changed forever when a prolific stalker infiltrates their social media accounts. And they're only a fraction of his many victims.

dir.name: [B][I][COLOR white]Catch Me A Killer[/COLOR][/I][/B]
dir.summary: Follow South Africa’s first forensic and investigative psychologist, Micki Pistorius (played by Charlotte Hope), as she studies the minds of South Africa's serial killers. Catch Me A Killer is an adaptation of Micki's autobiography that details her work as the first female criminal profiler in the country, which is brought to life as the events are depicted in the series.

dir.name: [B][I][COLOR white]Cold Case Files: DNA Speaks[/COLOR][/I][/B]
dir.summary: Bill Kurtis examines cold cases that are solved through advancements in DNA, along with help from victims’ families, law enforcement and the public. Each episode tells the story of how forensic evidence is used to solve murder cases that have remained unsolved for years.

dir.name: [B][I][COLOR white]Cold Case Killers[/COLOR][/I][/B]
dir.summary: A dedicated team review murder investigations that concluded without success, determined to bring perpetrators to justice no matter how much time has passed.

dir.name: [B][I][COLOR white]Crime Nation[/COLOR][/I][/B]
dir.summary: A captivating true-crime and justice anthology series that thrusts viewers into the gripping world of real-life mysteries, cold cases and heart-stopping investigations.

dir.name: [B][I][COLOR white]Crimes of the Century[/COLOR][/I][/B]
dir.summary: Never-before-seen footage and exclusive interviews offer a vitural scene-of-the-crime vantage point for history's most major news events.

dir.name: [B][I][COLOR white]Dark Waters: Murder in the Deep[/COLOR][/I][/B]
dir.summary: Dark Waters takes viewers deep into the world of murder on the ocean. Despite its promise of beauty and tranquility, the sea is a lawless world where jealousy, greed, deceit, and rage surface with the menace of a great white shark.

dir.name: [B][I][COLOR white]Does Murder Sleep[/COLOR][/I][/B]
dir.summary: When we sleep, we are at our most vulnerable. Sometimes crimes occur when a few or even all key characters are fast asleep. These stories tap into the primal fear, present since childhood, of what happens once we shut our eyes.

dir.name: [B][I][COLOR white]Faking It: Tears of a Crime[/COLOR][/I][/B]
dir.summary: The stories of people who have shed crocodile tears to hide their guilt in criminal cases.

dir.name: [B][I][COLOR white]Fatal Family Feuds[/COLOR][/I][/B]
dir.summary: Explores the harrowing world of homicides ignited by intense disputes within families. The series provides an in-depth look at these tragic cases, featuring firsthand accounts from family members and friends who survived the ordeal, as well as insights from the detectives who cracked them. Each episode delves into the motives behind the crimes, charting the origins, intensification, and catastrophic conclusions of these deadly domestic conflicts.

dir.name: [B][I][COLOR white]Fred and Rose West: Reopened[/COLOR][/I][/B]
dir.summary: Following a team of investigators as they explore new leads suggesting there may be more than Fred and Rose West's victims than their 12 known murders, making the use of Ground Penetrating Radar in new locations.

dir.name: [B][I][COLOR white]Fred West: The Glasgow Girls[/COLOR][/I][/B]
dir.summary: Uncovering the hidden lives and experiences of Fred West first three victims his first wife, Rena Costello, her daughter Charmaine and her friend Anne McFall, when he was living in Glasgow in the early 1960s.

dir.name: [B][I][COLOR white]Heist[/COLOR][/I][/B]
dir.summary: Millions in stolen cash. Missing luxury bourbon. Watch ordinary people almost get away with these extraordinary heists in this true crime series.

dir.name: [B][I][COLOR white]Hostage 911[/COLOR][/I][/B]
dir.summary: Negotiators record harrowing conversations with criminals who have taken people hostage. In each terrifying standoff, hear their conversations with criminals, and negotiators will break down their psychological tactics. Will the hostages get out alive?

dir.name: [B][I][COLOR white]How I Caught My Killer[/COLOR][/I][/B]
dir.summary: The real-life stories behind unique homicide cases with in-depth interviews, authentic archival material and cinematic recreations all packaged together into a fresh spin in the genre.

dir.name: [B][I][COLOR white]I Just Killed My Dad[/COLOR][/I][/B]
dir.summary: Anthony Templet shot his father and never denied it. But why he did it is a complex question with profound implications. Explore Anthony's psyche prior to the events of June 3, 2019 and the journey of his mental and emotional aftermath.

dir.name: [B][I][COLOR white]Inside the Heist[/COLOR][/I][/B]
dir.summary: The stories behind the most daring and audacious robberies in the world. Explore the planning, the personalities and the ingenuity involved in walking away with untold riches. These are the boldest robberies carried out by the criminal elite.

dir.name: [B][I][COLOR white]Jack the Ripper Hidden Victims[/COLOR][/I][/B]
dir.summary: Assembles top historians and crime experts to re-examine the case of Jack the Ripper. Leading experts reveal their theories and discuss the evidence to support them. And, retracing the final steps of his victims.

dir.name: [B][I][COLOR white]Jack the Ripper: The Definitive Story[/COLOR][/I][/B]
dir.summary: Two-part docudrama recreating the famous investigation using reenactments and state-of-the-art CGI.

dir.title: [B][I][COLORwhite]Law & Order True Crime The Menendez Murders[/COLOR][/I][/B]
dir.summary: An anthology series that delves into the players, the crime and the media circus, detailing the day-to-day battles of the trial and unveiling the shocking truth of what really went down when the cameras stopped rolling.

dir.name: [B][I][COLOR white]Most Evil[/COLOR][/I][/B]
dir.summary: Most Evil is an American forensics television program on Investigation Discovery presented by forensic psychiatrist Michael Stone of Columbia University. On the show, Stone rates murderers on a scale of evil that Stone himself has developed. The show features profiles on various murderers, serial killers, mass murderers and psychopaths.

dir.name: [B][I][COLOR white]Murder Among Friends[/COLOR][/I][/B]
dir.summary: When a group of people get together and take it upon themselves to kill. It can happen for a litany of reasons. But nothing is quite the same as a group murder.

dir.name: [B][I][COLOR white]My Son Jeffrey: The Dahmer Family Tapes[/COLOR][/I][/B]
dir.summary: Through never-before-heard family tape recordings , this 4-part true crime series offers a brand new insight into Jeffrey Dahmer, one of the world's most infamous serial killers and his victims.

dir.name: [B][I][COLOR white]No One Can Hear You Scream[/COLOR][/I][/B]
dir.summary: Survivors and investigators tell the true stories of horrifying crimes in the most isolated corners of the country, and one thing is perfectly clear--no one is safe when they are alone.

dir.name: [B][I][COLOR white]Perfect Wife: The Mysterious Disappearance of Sherri Papini[/COLOR][/I][/B]
dir.summary: Keith and Sherri Papini's seemingly idyllic family life is shattered when Sherri vanishes from their northern California neighborhood, triggering a frenzied search that becomes news around the world.

dir.name: [B][I][COLOR white]Predator at Large[/COLOR][/I][/B]
dir.summary: This true crime docuseries takes you deep inside peaceful communities in which a sadistic predator is living undetected. Brought to life by the extraordinary testimony of friends and family of the victims, local residents, and law enforcement, as well as those closest to the perpetrators, these terrifying stories reveal the true horror of what happens when nightmares come true.

dir.name: [B][I][COLOR white]Real Time Crime[/COLOR][/I][/B]
dir.summary: Police have a new weapon in the fight against crime. Across America, Real Time Crime Centers use surveillance cameras, tracking systems and gunshot detectors to solve crimes and bring criminals to justice. These are their stories.

dir.name: [B][I][COLOR white]Signs of a Psychopath[/COLOR][/I][/B]
dir.summary: For every psychopath there are signs. Would you see them? Revisiting some of the most dangerous killers in modern history to see which psychopathic traits they exhibited. Featuring real archive footage.

dir.name: [B][I][COLOR white]Stalked: Murder in Slow Motion[/COLOR][/I][/B]
dir.summary: Friends and family tell the stories of young women who were murdered by their stalker. Narrated by Kym Marsh who herself has been the target of an obsessive stalker.

dir.name: [B][I][COLOR white]Swipe Right for Murder[/COLOR][/I][/B]
dir.summary: Do you really know the person you're dating? 91 million of us search for love online, but internet dating can be dangerous. With access to the victims' families and police, this series looks at real life love stories that ended in tragedy.

dir.name: [B][I][COLOR white]Terrorism Close Calls[/COLOR][/I][/B]
dir.summary: The war on terror is everywhere and anywhere. In this series, we learn about the deadly terrorist attacks that almost happened or were not as deadly as planned. Each episodes explores a recently declassified terrorist scheme intended to cause mass casualties.

dir.name: [B][I][COLOR white]The 1980s: The Deadliest Decade[/COLOR][/I][/B]
dir.summary: Investigation Discovery transports viewers on a bittersweet and terrifying journey back in time, revealing the dark side of America's favorite decade.

dir.name: [B][I][COLOR white]The 1990s: The Deadliest Decade[/COLOR][/I][/B]
dir.summary: A look at notorious murders and crimes that happened during the 1990s.

dir.name: [B][I][COLOR white]The Beauty Queen Killer: 9 Days of Terror[/COLOR][/I][/B]
dir.summary: In 1984, 16-year-old Tina Risico is kidnapped by a killer who takes her on a hellish road trip – and forces her to participate in a brutal crime.

dir.title: [B][I][COLORwhite]The British Airways Killer[/COLOR][/I][/B]
dir.summary: Docuseries exploring the death of Joanna Simpson, a wealthy heiress who was killed by her husband, a British Airways pilot. The series tracks the case from that first phone call to the tragic discovery of her remains in a shallow grave in Windsor Great Park, to his conviction and the consequences - taking in an acrimonious divorce and the pre-nuptial agreement of a wealthy heiress that was to change British legal history.

dir.title: [B][I][COLORwhite]The Eleven[/COLOR][/I][/B]
dir.summary: Follow investigators as they reexamine the murders of eleven teenage girls in and around Galveston County, Texas after discovering a confession letter from current inmate and convicted murderer Edward Harold Bell.

dir.title: [B][I][COLORwhite]The Fall: Skydive Murder Plot[/COLOR][/I][/B]
dir.summary: An in-depth look at Victoria Cilliers' apparent skydiving 'accident' during which both her main and reserve parachutes failed, sending her hurtling straight to the ground. The incident set in motion an investigation by a pair of dogged detectives, DC Maddy Hennah and DI Paul Franklin, who spent two years pulling at the threads of Emile's life - revealing affairs, debts, sex clubs, escorts and murderous intent.

dir.name: [B][I][COLOR white]The FBI Declassified[/COLOR][/I][/B]
dir.summary: Follow The FBI Declassified gives viewers unprecedented access to some of the biggest cases handled by real-life FBI agents and analysts.

dir.name: [B][I][COLOR white]The Innocence Files[/COLOR][/I][/B]
dir.summary: The personal stories behind eight cases of wrongful conviction that the Innocence Project and organizations within the Innocence Network have worked to highlight and overturn.

dir.name: [B][I][COLOR white]The Jury: Murder Trial[/COLOR][/I][/B]
dir.summary: How much can we trust our justice system? This landmark experiment follows the restaging of a real-life murder trial in front of two juries of ordinary people. Will they reach the same verdict?

dir.name: [B][I][COLOR white]The Jury Speaks[/COLOR][/I][/B]
dir.summary: Reexamining some of the most high-profile and controversial cases in history through the eyes of the people who served on the original jury. Each episode delves into a new case including Michael Jackson, OJ Simpson, George Zimmerman and Robert Durst, as jurors uncover what really happened inside the courtroom.

dir.name: [B][I][COLOR white]The Lesson Is Murder[/COLOR][/I][/B]
dir.summary: Psychological criminologist and ex-FBI special agent Dr. Bryanna Fox and her class of graduate students study convicted murderers; they evaluate their personality traits and develop psychological profiles.

item.name: [B][I][COLOR white]The London Underground Killer[/COLOR][/I][/B]
item.summary: In a South London police station, officers are shocked to discover a man has been murdered in a locked cell. The suspected killer is his cellmate, a homeless man named Kieran Kelly, in custody for theft. Police interview 53-year-old Kelly, who has a long rap sheet for petty crimes, and he calmly confesses to killing the man in the cell, but detectives are unprepared for what comes next.

dir.name: [B][I][COLOR white]The Ripper[/COLOR][/I][/B]
dir.summary: For five years, from 1975 to 1980, the Yorkshire Ripper murders cast a dark shadow over the lives of women in the North of England. 13 women were dead and the police seemed incapable of catching the killer. No one felt safe – and every man was a suspect.

dir.name: [B][I][COLOR white]The Suitcase Murders[/COLOR][/I][/B]
dir.summary: The gruesome crimes of killers who dispose of their victims in luggage. Experts identify the sociopathic motivations of these killers and reveal how their attempts to hide their victims offer the clues they need to bring them to justice.

dir.name: [B][I][COLOR white]The West Memphis Three[/COLOR][/I][/B]
dir.summary: On May 6th, 1993, police discover three eight-year-old boys murdered, mutilated and hogtied in a watery ditch in West Memphis, Arkansas. Investigators quickly seize three teen suspects they believe are Satanists. But outsiders see the case otherwise. A movement arises in hopes of liberating the West Memphis Three.

dir.name: [B][I][COLOR white]True Conviction[/COLOR][/I][/B]
dir.summary: The real-life stories of how homicides are solved on the street and won in the courtroom. Host Anna-Sigga Nicolazzi, a decorated Brooklyn prosecutor, takes you inside the fight for justice for victims and their loved ones.

dir.name: [B][I][COLOR white]Twisted Killers[/COLOR][/I][/B]
dir.summary: Examining bizarre killers and what drives acts of evil, the shocking stories of some of America's darkest and most unusual murderers. Along the way, a trio of criminal experts, including former NYC DA Beth Karas, retired LAPD Homicide Detective Tracey Benjamin and forensic psychologist Kate Termini, provides insight and expertise on how these twisted killers were brought to justice.

dir.title: [B][I][COLORwhite]Unbreakable: Live to Tell[/COLOR][/I][/B]
dir.summary: How do you find the strength to go on after witnessing a loved one's tragic murder? Unbreakable: Live to Tell follows extraordinary survivors from every heart-skipping beat of the attack to the odds-defying recovery that led to their new "normal."

dir.title: [B][I][COLORwhite]What the Killer Did Next[/COLOR][/I][/B]
dir.summary: Ian Stewart murdered his partner, children's author Helen Bailey, in 2016. He dumped her and her dog in a septic tank at her Hertfordshire home, but reported her

dir.title: [B][I][COLORwhite]Worlds Most Wanted[/COLOR][/I][/B]
dir.summary: Heinous criminals have avoided capture despite massive rewards and global investigations. This docuseries profiles some of the world’s most wanted.
